alert.note: Alert for Floyd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 7:43AM EDT until July 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is ongoing. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Breathitt, Floyd, Knott and Magoffin. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 741 AM EDT, Flooding persists due to heavy rain that fell during the late night and early morning hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Estill, Martin, Wayland, Allen, Bosco, Garret, Porter Junction, Hippo, Eastern, Hueysville, Betty, Mid, Langley, Glo, Handshoe, Pyramid, Bolyn, Mousie, Hunter and Minnie.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
